java/liquibase/preconditions/AndPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00006 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionErrorException;
00007 
00008 import java.util.ArrayList;
00009 import java.util.List;
00010 
00014 public class AndPrecondition extends PreconditionLogic {
00015 
00016     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException, PreconditionErrorException {
00017         boolean allPassed = true;
00018         List<FailedPrecondition> failures = new ArrayList<FailedPrecondition>();
00019         for (Precondition precondition : getNestedPreconditions()) {
00020             try {
00021                 precondition.check(database, changeLog);
00022             } catch (PreconditionFailedException e) {
00023                 failures.addAll(e.getFailedPreconditions());
00024                 allPassed = false;
00025                 break;
00026             }
00027         }
00028         if (!allPassed) {
00029             throw new PreconditionFailedException(failures);
00030         }
00031     }
00032 
00033 
00034     public String getTagName() {
00035         return "and";
00036     }
00037 }
